import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const mealUrl = "http://localhost:8900/mealtype" class QuickSearch extends Component { constructor(){ super() this.state={ mealtype :'', name :'', } } renderMealtype = (data) => { if (data){ return data.map((item) => { return(

{item.name}

) }) } } render() { return (

Quick Seraches

<>Discover Restaurants by type of meal

{this.renderMealtype(this.state.name)}
<>Start your day with exclusive breakfast options
{/*

Lunch

Start your day with exclusive Lunchs options
*/} {/*

Snacks

Start your day with exclusive Snacks options
*/} {/*

Dinner

<>Start your day with exclusive Dinner options
*/} {/*

Drinks

<>Start your day with exclusive Drinks options
*/} {/*

Nightlife

<>Start your day with exclusive Nightlife options
*/}
) } componentDidMount(){ fetch(mealUrl,{method:'GET'}) .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => { this.setState({mealtype:data}) }) } } export default QuickSearch;
